dct_title_s: A map of all the earth
dct_description_sm: Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
Shows topography, drainage, boundaries, places of historical interest.
Features a decorative cartouche with a dedication to "Gilbert Lord Arch Bishop of Canterbury".
14 pictorial vignettes surrounding map: [Depictions of biblical events].
In English, some text in Hebrew.
Appears in Moxon's Sacred geographie or scriptural mapps. London, 1671.
